column4: ok, i added a user and trying to ftp to that user.  it says my password is incorrect
even though I just set the password for passwd <user>
does that mean I need to add it to the ftp group?
hey _DGM_, none of my users are part of the ftp group but other users can connect to ftp without any issues.  I just created the user
what do the logs on the server say?
